column5: Our Lager,(canadain stuff not that water amercians drink, thank thy lord for this) Which art in barrels, Hallowed be thy drink,  Thy kegdom come, I fill thee mug, At home, as in the tavern.  Give us this day, our foamy head, And forgive us our spillings, As we forgive those who spill upon us, And lead us not into inebriation, But deliver us from hangovers,
